EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending the PTI Fall 2012 Training Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Thank You! November 14, 2012 <https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_bE1zGkJYLAj5hel>
Thank you for attending the Perform Training Institute (PTI) Fall 2012 Training Summit! Over 180 attendees from over 90 agencies participated, and we'd love to hear what you thought so that we can make the next training event even better!
Tell Us What You Thought <https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_bE1zGkJYLAj5hel>
Phil Sisk VP of Operations and National Sales Director TriTech Software Systems| www.tritech.com
